translation.en: [voice] Vampling.
-[voice in dream] Vampling. -[shouts]
Just a bad dream, Mr. Rutabaga.
Gotta lay off three-spice pizzas.
Happy Birthday. Day 4,745 of my unremarkable life.
translation.it: Buon compleanno! Giorno 4745 della mia vita insignificante.

translation.en: [dog] Wait for it.
The first time's always the best.
translation.it: La prima volta è la migliore.

translation.en: -Ha-ha. -[mother] Honey? Time to get up.
The school musical auditions are today.
translation.it: Alzati. Hai l'audizione a scuola. Sì, gli umani.

translation.en: Ah-ha. Humans. [sneezes]

translation.it: MYTHIC - IBRIDO - VAMPLING - I CACCIATORI LASCIA STARE IL MIGLIORE!

translation.en: Three, two, go time.
-[boy] Here we go. -[beeping]
Brah, smoke bomb? Cruel.
My wings don't work with smoke on them. Well, that's how you catch a Hugar.
translation.it: - Il fumo blocca le ali. - È così che si cattura uno Hugar.

translation.en: You're gonna hunt every Blended who wants to live as a human?
translation.it: - Dai la caccia agli Ibridi tra gli umani? - Sì.

translation.en: Mythics, Blendeds whatever.
Whoa. Hey. What are you doing?
Yep.
Man what, are you, like, 13?
Go be an influencer like every other kid your age.
Please. The world is bigger than your phone. Besides, I come from a long line of hunters.
translation.it: Il mondo è più di un telefono. Vengo da una stirpe di Cacciatori.

translation.en: It's what I was born to do. Capture and dispose of monsters.
translation.it: Il mondo è più di un telefono. Vengo da una stirpe di Cacciatori. - Eliminiamo i mostri. - Non vuoi rompere il ciclo?

translation.en: Ever think of breaking the cycle?
translation.it: - Eliminiamo i mostri. - Non vuoi rompere il ciclo?

translation.en: Huh? What do you think? -[cackles] -You could be a hero.
translation.it: Che ne dici? Puoi fare l'eroe.

translation.en: Don't do it, man. Whoa.
[boy] It must have been the three-spice pizza.
Last time I had one, I dreamt I was trapped in a washing machine on spin cycle.
translation.it: L'ultima volta, ho sognato che ero in una centrifuga.

translation.en: [girl] Rainey talking? Talking! No way, no how. No dream.
translation.it: Rainey parlava! Dal nulla, da lucida, da sveglia.

translation.en: I woke up floating above my bed.
Maybe I can fly.
Sick. And come here. Check this out.
Nah. You're messing with me. That's obvs a filter.
translation.it: No, vuoi fregarmi. È un filtro.

translation.en: Argh. It was real!
[boy] Whoa, Carmie.
See? That is what I'm talking about.
translation.it: Visto? È di questo che parlo.

translation.en: Maybe I'm a superhero.
The first one without a tragic origin story.
translation.it: - Senza origini tragiche. - Non toccare niente.

translation.en: Carmie, don't touch anything. Don't kick anything.
translation.it: - Senza origini tragiche. - Non toccare niente. - Non calciare, non farti vedere. - Devono vedermi.

translation.en: You can't be seen. No. I want to be seen.
translation.it: - Non calciare, non farti vedere. - Devono vedermi.

translation.en: Girl power. Tween excellence. Adopted kids make the world spin.
translation.it: Girl power. Eccellenza giovanile. I figli adottati spaccano.

translation.en: I have superpowers.
Leanna is going to be so jelly. I'm gonna, like, crush this audition.
And I'm maybe just going to, like, float right over her.
There's no floating. There's no anything until we figure out what happened to you.
translation.it: Non farai niente finché non capiremo che succede.

translation.en: Well, maybe what happened to me was so that I can finally have a thing. Superpowers.
translation.it: Magari succede perché possa avere qualcosa anch'io: dei superpoteri.

translation.en: You're not getting it.
If you've been given powers, you've also been given enemies.
translation.it: Se hai ricevuto dei poteri, avrai anche nemici.

translation.en: It's how it works.
translation.it: Se hai ricevuto dei poteri, avrai anche nemici. Funziona così.

translation.en: A voice in my dream did keep saying, "Vampling."
translation.it: Una voce nel mio incubo diceva: "Vampling".

translation.en: "Vampling"?
What does that mean? What does that mean?
♪ They're trying to ride my wave Got 'em coasting ♪
[girl] Carmela? Yay! Audition day.
[gasps] Who spilt water on the floor? People, please. A little courtesy.
translation.it: Chi ha versato l'acqua? Fate attenzione!

translation.en: It's gonna be hazardous dancing next to her.
translation.it: Sarà rischioso ballare vicino a lei.

translation.en: As friends, Carmela, I--
Uh, she hates that name. Carm, Carmie? All good. Never Carmela.
translation.it: Odia quel nome. Carm, Carmie. Mai Carmela.

translation.en: I won't remember that.
You are, like, so brave to even audition. Like, why?
Wardrobe, makeup, an audience staring at me for 90 minutes.
translation.it: Guardaroba, trucco, il pubblico che mi guarda.

translation.en: It'll be fun. Fun?
Really? I've been practising for months.
Mm-hmm. Carmela, I've trained my entire life for this moment. Not a bit of it was fun.
translation.it: Carmela, mi preparo da sempre. Non è stato divertente.

translation.en: Acting, voice and dance lessons since I was five.
translation.it: Recitazione, canto e danza a cinque anni.

translation.en: I won Miss Kramposki's Deli Queen pageant three years in a row.
translation.it: Sono stata Reginetta della salumeria Kramposki per tre anni di seguito.

translation.en: Well, I can do all the TikTok dances.
translation.it: Faccio tutti i balli di TikTok.

translation.en: The first parts
kinda. [laughs]
I was chosen most likely to succeed at my kindergarten graduation.
translation.it: Ero la studentessa più promettente all'asilo.

translation.en: Wow. That's a lot of pressure to live up to.
Never, ever speak to me again.
translation.it: Non osare più parlare con me.

translation.en: Good luck. Kidding. Not kidding.
-You sure about this? -Yes. This is my moment.
translation.it: - Sei sicura? - Sì. È il mio momento.

translation.en: Hi. I'm Kev.
Let's see what we have.
-Okay. Let's go. -[dance music plays]
[Leanna] Don't try to follow me.
[teacher] Five, six, seven, eight.
[Leanna] Excuse me.
First cut. Back line. -Thank you. -[boy] Argh.
And six, seven, eight.
[Leanna] Carmela, get behind me.
Who pushed me?
-[shouts] -She's clumsy.
Ever since she was a kid.
[teacher] Okay. Final cut. Let's see who has what it takes to be in this show.
translation.it: Ok. Ultima eliminazione. Vediamo chi parteciperà.

translation.en: -It's all good. Let's go. -[music resumes]
Let's go and see who makes the show.
translation.it: E vediamo chi ce la farà.

translation.en: Honestly, what were you thinking?
Mrs. Johnson, if adults knew that 98% of the time
translation.it: Sig.ra Johnson, se gli adulti sapessero che il 98% delle volte la risposta è:

translation.en: the answer to that question is
translation.it: sapessero che il 98% delle volte la risposta è:

translation.en: "I wasn't thinking," would they keep asking?
I'm not playing this game with you, Carmie. Not even on your birthday.
translation.it: Non giocherò con te. Neanche al tuo compleanno.

translation.en: Vice-Principal Chase will be with you shortly.
translation.it: La vicepreside ti riceverà a breve.

translation.en: -We gotta go. I think I know-- -Mr. Gardner?
translation.it: UFFICIO PRESIDE - Andiamo. Forse so… - Sig. Gardner.

translation.en: Kev. Just Kev.
translation.it: - Andiamo. Forse so… - Sig. Gardner. - Kev. Solo Kev. - Che ci fai qui?

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.it: - Kev. Solo Kev. - Che ci fai qui?

translation.en: Hoping to prevent catastrophic events from occurring to my friend,
translation.it: Evito eventi catastrofici alla mia amica,

translation.en: the school, the world.
That's nice, but you're going to do it out of this office.
translation.it: Bello. Ma lo farai fuori da qui. Ciao.

translation.en: Now, Kev!
People always talk about nature versus nurture
translation.it: CREDI IN TE STESSO. NATURA CONTRO CULTURA Si parla sempre di natura contro cultura.

translation.en: and which one dominates.
translation.it: Si parla sempre di natura contro cultura.

translation.en: What no one ever talks about is what happens when the natural order mixes with the unnatural order.
translation.it: Ma se l'ordine naturale si mischia con quello innaturale?

translation.en: That would be something to talk about.
When you said unnatural, did you mean supernatural?
No idea.
translation.it: Non so. Le cose mi entrano in testa ed escono dalla bocca.

translation.en: Things go into my brain and immediately exit my mouth.
translation.it: Non so. Le cose mi entrano in testa ed escono dalla bocca. Per molti è bizzarro, per me è un dono.

translation.en: Most people say it's weird. I say it's a gift.
translation.it: Per molti è bizzarro, per me è un dono.

translation.en: So, you weren't talking to that kid?
I wasn't not talking to him. [chuckles]
translation.it: Quindi non parlavi con lui? Non stavo parlando con lui.

translation.en: The name's Madison. Happy Birthday.
How did you know it was my birthday?
Miss Henley?
Ooh. [thuds]
I'm okay. New shoes.
translation.it: Sto bene. Ho le scarpe nuove.

translation.en: This isn't over.
[Chase] Now, Miss Henley.
I didn't do anything, okay? They were the ones who act--
translation.it: Non ho fatto niente. Sono state loro…

translation.en: Mmm.
translation.it: Non ho fatto niente. Sono state loro… Dicono che hai spinto Leanna.

translation.en: They say you pushed Leanna off the stage.
[Carmie] Can we just call it circumstances outside of my control?
translation.it: Io dico che le circostanze erano fuori dal mio controllo?

translation.en: I'm sure they were. Regardless, I need to put on a musical.
translation.it: Ne sono certa. Ma io devo mettere su un musical.

translation.en: [Carmie] Musical.
Yeah, yeah. Let's get into it. Do some, what do they called? Rehearsals.
translation.it: Diamoci da fare. Faremo, come si dice, le prove.

translation.en: Bring in the audience and I'll own it. Whatever "it" is. What is "it"? [chuckles]
translation.it: Conquisterò il pubblico. Qualunque cosa sia. Che c'è?

translation.en: You and Leanna clearly don't get along, and that is a problem that I don't want to deal with.
translation.it: Tu e Leanna non andate d'accordo. Ed è un problema che non m'interessa.

translation.en: Well, we're on the same page, and I
Especially because she is a trained singer and dancer.
translation.it: Lei è una cantante e ballerina esperta

translation.en: And you, while enthusiastic, are not trained.
translation.it: e tu, sebbene appassionata, non sei preparata.

translation.en: Oh, I'm trained. Yeah. Tap, jazz, hip-hop.
translation.it: Sono preparata. Tip tap, jazz, hip hop.

translation.en: I've been studying YouTube. Yeah, for months. I've got this.
translation.it: Ho studiato su YouTube. Per mesi. Ce la farò.

translation.en: Say nothing! Say nothing.
I'm sure you think so, but I have a decision to make.
translation.it: Sono certa che lo pensi. Ma io devo decidere.

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll be fine without Leanna.
Not the decision I was thinking.
I'll let you know if you're going to be a part of the musical or not.
translation.it: Ti farò sapere se sei nel musical o no.

translation.en: -Oh, but I can-- -Great. We're done.
-What? -[Kev] You didn't say anything?
How could I? She was telling me I might've blown my chance to be in the musical.
translation.it: Come facevo? Forse non farò il musical.

translation.en: That's not your biggest problem. Really? Because I want No. I need to be in it.
translation.it: - Non è il tuo problema più grande. - Sì? Perché voglio. No, devo esserci.

translation.en: What's wrong with one of us, the outsiders,
translation.it: Che male c'è se uno di noi, un emarginato, non fico,

translation.en: slightly uncool kids, not really talented, succeeding?
translation.it: Che male c'è se uno di noi, un emarginato, non fico, senza talento, ce la fa?

translation.en: Stop. Listen. I remember where I heard the word "Vampling".
translation.it: So dove ho sentito la parola "Vampling".

translation.en: -So, it's a thing? Vampling? -Yes.
People just don't kick trash cans across the street.
translation.it: Gli umani non calciano bidoni così.

translation.en: Adrenalin?
Doesn't explain you blasting Leanna off the stage,
translation.it: Non spiega il lancio di Leanna, il fluttuare…

translation.en: -you floating, or -Hormones?
translation.it: Non spiega il lancio di Leanna, il fluttuare… Ormoni.

translation.en: What? I'm 13. May be possible.
Not possible. Something in you has changed and given you these powers.
translation.it: Qualcosa in te è cambiato e ti ha dato questi poteri.

translation.en: Like Zendaya?
She doesn't have superpowers.
Really? Because if you know, you know. If you don't, you never will.
translation.it: Se lo sai, ok. Se non lo sai, non lo saprai mai.

translation.en: [Kev] I'm hitting the stacks. Excellent. Who's your friend?
translation.it: - Vado in magazzino. - Bene. Chi è lei?

translation.en: It's Carmie. You've met her, like, a hundred times.
translation.it: È Carmie. L'hai vista cento volte.

translation.en: But always ignores me.
Maybe, maybe not.
Don't touch the sleeved books. Only Kev.
translation.it: Solo Kev tocca i libri imbustati.

translation.en: He respects the art and he knows how to deal with tape.
translation.it: Lui rispetta l'arte e sa usare il nastro adesivo.

translation.en: You! Kid!
Nice try, but back, back, back. Back, back. Stop.
Forward. Back Back.
Does this always happen?
-Yeah. -Okay.
Yes. Good.
Good. The comic returned. That's good. You? Still not good.
translation.it: Bene. Il fumetto è tornato, ma tu? Tu non tornerai.

translation.en: You're banned for life.
Now, be gone!
-[Carmie] I found it. -Put those down there.
You know these are just comics, right? That's what they want you to think.
translation.it: - Sono solo fumetti. - Loro vogliono che pensi quello.

translation.en: Who's "they"? There's always a "they" running things.
They have used comic books to send secret messages for a century.
translation.it: Mandano messaggi segreti con i fumetti.

translation.en: -To who? -To them.
I'm not even going to ask who "them" are.
-Buck Rogers, 1929. -Okay.
Why was it that the first rocket-ship design -ever came from a comic book? -I have it.
translation.it: Perché il primo progetto di un razzo è stato tratto da un fumetto?

translation.en: So they could get the plans across the country without anyone knowing.
translation.it: Così diffondevano il progetto in tutto il paese in segreto.

translation.en: Do you know about that? [laughs]
Of course you don't. Nobody does who doesn't read comics.
translation.it: Lo sapevi? Certo che no. Chi non legge i fumetti non lo sa. Ecco.

translation.en: Ah. Here we go.
translation.it: Chi non legge i fumetti non lo sa. Ecco.

translation.en: What's a Mythic? They're legendary monsters who came before man.
translation.it: - Cos'è un Mythic? - Sono mostri leggendari.

translation.en: So, I'm a monster?
No. But you could be a Blended,
translation.it: No, ma potresti essere un Ibrido.

translation.en: the offspring of a Mythic and a human.
translation.it: Figlia di un Mythic e un umano.

translation.en: Grab me the magnifying glass.
Uh, super speed. Nice.
I am going to dance circles around Leanna.
translation.it: Farò le giravolte intorno a Leanna.

translation.en: This is the best day of my life! [squeals]
Carm?
"Vampling:
"the Blended offspring of a vampire,
translation.it: La progenie Ibrida di un vampiro.

translation.en: and their powers are super speed," check,
translation.it: I poteri sono: super velocità. Ce l'hai.

translation.en: "enhanced strength," check.
"energy blast "
-[chuckles] The best. Check. -Yep.
translation.it: Colpi energetici. Il migliore. Ce l'hai.

translation.en: -"Fly." -Fly?
Really? [gasps, thuds]
Scratch flying. We'll put "float."
I can't be a Vampling. My parents are normal, kinda.
Your bio parents? What do we even know about them?
translation.it: - Più o meno. - Quelli veri? Cosa sappiamo di loro?

translation.en: My parents adopted me when I was three months old. I have no idea.
translation.it: Sono stata adottata a tre mesi. Niente.

translation.en: So, one of your birth parents could've been a vampire.
translation.it: Uno di loro potrebbe essere un vampiro.

translation.en: That's impossible.
I'd say it's pretty undeniable.
"A Vampling receives their powers on their 13th year."
translation.it: "Un Vampling riceve i poteri a 13 anni."

translation.en: Happy Birthday, by the way.
I guess I always thought I was a little different, but never thought I was a freak.
translation.it: Mi sento diversa, ma non pensavo di essere un mostro.

translation.en: It's my dad. I gotta go.
You're not a freak. You're my best friend.
translation.it: Non sei un mostro, sei mia amica.

translation.en: [comic store owner] So, you just moved to town?
You always ask so many questions?
-I just asked one. -That's a lot.
Okay. Show me what you think you have. Maybe.
Is communicating a difficult thing for you?
Is that another question?
Yes. No. Maybe. I That wasn't a question.
translation.it: - È un'altra domanda? - Sì. No. Forse. Non era una domanda.

translation.en: [clears throat] I heard you are
the best at what I do.
Hey, kiddo. You got to answer your texts.
I know. Sorry. I'm just distracted.
Ah. Well, you want me to pick you up?
I mean, your birthday tacos are here, and they are a-taco-ing.
translation.it: I tacos di compleanno sono spettacolari.

translation.en: No. I'm good. See you soon.
translation.it: No, torno da sola. A tra poco.

translation.en: Nature-versus-nurture girl. What up?
Sorry. I didn't see you. I thought someone or something
translation.it: Scusa, non ti ho vista. Sembrava che mi seguissero, ma forse no.

translation.en: was following me, but maybe not. I don't even know.
translation.it: Sembrava che mi seguissero, ma forse no.

translation.en: Sometimes I think people are following me when they're not, and then, sometimes, people are following me when I think they're not. So, I don't know.
translation.it: Se penso che mi seguano, non lo fanno. E se mi seguono, penso di no.

translation.en: -You always talk this fast? -Yes, I do.
Because life goes fast and you have no idea
translation.it: La vita va veloce e non sai come sarà,

translation.en: what's going to happen next, even if "next" is what you want, which in my life has never been the case
translation.it: anche se è ciò che volevi. Ma a me non capita.

translation.en: The name's Madison. Remember?
Sorry. Carmie. Nice to officially meet you.
My mom and I just moved here. It's her restaurant back there.
translation.it: Ci siamo trasferite. È il nostro ristorante.

translation.en: Oh. That must be nice. You can eat whatever you want. -No. It doesn't work like that. -Oh.
translation.it: - Bello. Mangi quello che vuoi. - No, non funziona così.

translation.en: Those girls you drenched at school were pretty upset. They had a lot to say about you.
translation.it: Le ragazze a scuola erano arrabbiate. Hanno avuto da dire su di te.

translation.en: It's a long story.
Well, curious minds want to know.
Have you ever wanted to be someone special,
not just an outsider looking in?
Well, today, I had my chance to be special, and I blew it.
translation.it: Oggi ho avuto un'occasione e l'ho sprecata.

translation.en: Well, there's always second chances. Besides, being an outsider kind of makes you cooler.
translation.it: C'è sempre una seconda occasione. Ed essere emarginata rende più fica.

translation.en: Impossible.
Joan of Arc. Greta Thunberg. Zendaya.
All outsiders trailblazing new paths. [Carmie] I want to be like all of them.
translation.it: - Emarginate, pioniere. - Voglio essere come loro.

translation.en: [Madison chuckles] Exactly.
You get it. But what if you turned out to be someone you never thought you were?
translation.it: Ma se scoprissi di essere una persona che non immaginavi?

translation.en: That would be so dope. I hope I have that problem.
translation.it: Sarebbe fantastico. Spero che avrò quel problema.

translation.en: Wait. What were we talking about?
Listen. We can't change who we are,
and when you really think about it, would you want to?
translation.it: E se ci pensi bene, lo vorresti?

translation.en: Did you just
Uh, did you did you just
translation.it: Mi hai appena… Mi hai appena… Come?

translation.en: How?
Uh, adrenalin. Lots of adrenalin.
But what I think I just saw isn't possible. Look. I have to go.
translation.it: - Quello che ho visto è impossibile. - Senti, devo andare.

translation.en: But I mean, you just saved my life.
translation.it: Ma mi hai salvato la vita! Ne parliamo?

translation.en: -Can we talk about this? -No.
translation.it: Ma mi hai salvato la vita! Ne parliamo? No. Sì.

translation.en: Yes.
I don't know, okay? Uh, I can't be late.
And the tacos are a-taco-ing, so
translation.it: Non posso fare tardi, i tacos mi aspettano.

translation.en: [gasps] This isn't over!
-[girl 1] I would love that. -[girl 2] Okay.
-[girl 1] Yeah. -[indistinct chatter]
That was so sick.
It's my birthday. All good.
-[girls laughing] -[phone chimes]
Oh. Where am I?
Understudy. Understudy.
Understudy!
I made it kind of.
Hmm. Thought I'd gotten rid of all these.
Kev? I'll be in my office. Lock up when you're all finished.
translation.it: Kev! Vado in ufficio. Chiudi quando hai finito.

translation.en: -Got it. -And, uh, Kev?
-Don't forget your phone. -[Kev] Oh.
Thank you.
You really want to explain to people why you can fly?
translation.it: Vuoi spiegare a tutti perché voli?

translation.en: I knew you could talk. I thought I was hearing things this morning.
translation.it: Lo sapevo che parli! Non l'ho immaginato.

translation.en: I always could. Now that you understand me, check your teeth.
translation.it: L'ho sempre fatto. Ora che capisci, controlla i denti.

translation.en: What?
Your fangs. A dead giveaway.
translation.it: Sono aguzzi. È un chiaro indizio.

translation.en: I really am a Vampling!
Pull those beauties in. Taco time!
translation.it: Via le zanne! È ora dei tacos.

translation.en: You are going to take a lot of getting used to.
translation.it: Ci sono tante cose a cui abituarsi.

translation.en: [Rainey] Out of my way! Out of my way!
There's my birthday girl.
[both] We're hungry.
Carmie, meet Dylan. He just moved in down the block. His mom's working tonight, so I invited him for dinner.
translation.it: Lui è Dylan. È nuovo. Sua mamma lavorava e l'ho invitato.

translation.en: Hey, Dylan. Welcome to the neighbourhood.
Happy Birthday, Carmie. Thirteen is a big year.
translation.it: Buon compleanno. Compiere tredici anni è importante.

translation.en: Yeah.
So, how was the first day of the rest of your life, honey?
translation.it: Com'è stato il primo giorno della nuova vita?

translation.en: I believe I broke my unremarkable streak.
translation.it: Credo di aver smesso con la mediocrità.

translation.en: Oh. Well, birthday tacos for the birthday girl. Let's go.
translation.it: Credo di aver smesso con la mediocrità. Dei bei tacos per la festeggiata.

translation.en: [mother] Mm-hmm. Yes.
Dylan, why don't you sit over here with us?
So cute when so tiny. No way I'm staying in here.
translation.it: - Così carino e piccolino. - Non voglio stare qui.

translation.en: You can't keep us from the humans.
That kid is weird but he delivers.
translation.it: Quel ragazzo è strano, ma esegue gli ordini.

translation.en: So many more to catch.
-[cackles] -Help!
